author: vkhristenko
body:
on top of PR13399 as it touches the config of hcalcalib application

1) eliminated try/catch
2) from OfflineMC sequence I remove RawTask module
3) put a copy constructor for ContainerSingle1D as it won't work as is when trying to place such an object into a vector... - crashes hcalcalib application otherwise... 

VK
title: fixing some problems with HCAL DQM code
